website_summaries.verdict: A favorite among parents, as it’s alcohol-free, eco-friendly, and made with safe ingredients. Not tested on animals and safe for kids.
pros: Ideal for those with sensitive skin, as it contains no alcohol
Biodegradable formula with thyme oil has been rigorously tested at a top US microbiology lab
Spray bottle makes it easy to dispense sanitizer with little to no mess
cons: Some people find the smell unpleasant and comparable to hospital disinfectant
Reports of issues with the spray straw that make it hard to use product

customer_reviews.title: Formula changed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this product is being discontinued - I tried to find in different stores and this original scent is now really tough to get... but when I ordered from Amazon I was surprised to find the formula has changed. It used to be a nice fresh herbal scent (kind of smelled like thyme) and now it's more sweet and a bit chemically smelling. It also stays a little sticky on your hands. I hope the original comes back!
customer_reviews.author: JenGA

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sanitizer. I work in healthcare and brought it to work with me to avoid constantly using the ones at the hospital that dry out my hands so badly that they crack in the winter. This stuff is moisturizing and never dries out my hands!! I love it. It smells great too. I recently had a baby and bring one with me at all times. I don’t have to worry about touching him afterwards because I know there are no chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea P

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without harsh chemical sanitizers!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this hand sanitizer! The size of the bottle is perfect, it can be kept discreetly in a purse, bag, or stowed away in a glove compartment. The smell is much more pleasant than straight alcohol, and I like knowing I’m not using harsh/unhealthy chemicals on my already sensitive skin. And a little goes a long way! Just 2-3 spritzes and you’re good to go! As others have mentioned, I too keep a bottle in my car and made it through this past winter (even Chicago sub-zero temps!) without freezing up or changing the consistency. I will definitely buy this again and have recommended it to friends and coworkers!
customer_reviews.author: C. Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Gentle, clean, easy to carry with you without worry of leaking.
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are gentle while they sanitize. It has a subtle, light smell that reminds me of herbs. It’s not a bad smell at all, and it doesn’t dry out my hands. I love it way better than gooping on that alcohol gel from those pump containers. And my hands don’t feel gross from having stuff globed all over them. It’s just a nice light spritz. My co-worker used my Clean Well spray and now she’s hooked on it too. They are a good size for travel, so I keep one in my desk and one in my purse. You don’t have to worry about it leaking either. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works so well! Pocket size!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sanitizer! I purchased a pack of multiples because I wanted to have one in each vehicle, different pocketbooks etc. I’m very sensitive to chemical scents so most hand sanitizers give me a headache and make me feel sick. But this one doesn’t effect me at all! I try to avoid alcohol based hand sanitizers as well because they dry my skin out terribly. This is not alcohol based and doesn’t dry my skin! I love the compact size of these as well, they aren’t bulky and fit easily in most bags and even your pants pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Expires in 6 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed to order this on January 15 and see that it expires in March of this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and better than alcohol-based sanitizers
customer_reviews.text: Much better smelling than the alcohol-based sanitizers, and doesn't dry out your hands either! The original scent has a lemongrass type of scent, which is nice. I like the travel size version of this as I can carry it around in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Necessary
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years from everything to spraying on cotton ball piece to disinfect my light treatment tools to given most recently as a gift to my father undergoing cancer treatment in a large infusion center. For family travel it is a MUST after every pit stop along the way in addition to normal hand washing!
customer_reviews.author: Skeezikz the Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff. I use it after the passing of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. I use it after the passing of the peace in church. My choir lead (a wonderful mezzo) said that she feels that cleaning her hands with this natural product kept her from being sick all winter. It is so fresh smelling too and not offensive like some hand sanitizers. Update March 20, 2018 still vouch for this great stuff. Use it all year long especially before and after you blow your nose or touch anything into your mouth. Use it after you shake hands or eat. Totally works, smells pleasant, isn't drying and doesn't smell like a chemical.
customer_reviews.author: toodles233

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and cannot use alcohol based products or commercial harsh hand soaps. I have to deal with money at work so enjoy being able to clean my hands safely, and without irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: I've had several friends comment on how nice it is that it's a spray
customer_reviews.text: I take this everywhere with me. I've had several friends comment on how nice it is that it's a spray. The amount you get out is more controlled than a gel and it has less of a propensity to make a mess in your purse. My hands feel fresh after using and the scent isn't too overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: LMeadows

customer_reviews.title: Great hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: We use this hand sanitizer for our daughter because it does not tear up our daughter's hands the way that alcohol based gels do. We originally found it at Whole Foods but no longer live near one of their stores. We're glad to find it at a decent price on Amazon. The original scent is pleasant and the size of the bottle is easy to carry. We sent one to school so that our daughter can use it before lunch and after using the restroom (school policy). It does not dry out her hands, which is especially helpful in winter months. I highly recommend Cleanwell hand sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great items love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this and the company they didn't keep from public purchasing for covid I'll buy from them from now on it smells wonderful and dry quick its a spray
customer_reviews.author: Angel baby Skys

customer_reviews.title: Great Product smell not the best
customer_reviews.text: The scent is ok. Definitely smells like a melaleuca product which I wasn’t the most fond of. Overall I think the feel of it is great. It does the job that’s intended and this product gets a 5 star from me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbree & Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Not effective against COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT effective against COVID-19 because it is less than 60% alcohol or similar germicide. We felt the advertisement is a little misleading and certainly not fortcoming
customer_reviews.author: george B

customer_reviews.title: No More Allergic Reactions
customer_reviews.text: My daughter volunteers at the shelter and has to drench her hands in sanitizer every 10 minutes for 3 hours! She was having a reaction to the usual stuff they have at the shelter, so I bought this for her to try and it worked GREAT! It does take a few sprays to do the job though, so I don't know if it'll last as long as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Raeann Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get a 6 pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but it is advertised as a 6 pack and I only received a single bottle. I can't find a way to contact Amazon about how to get the rest of the order I paid for. Otherwise, i'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J. Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of icky alcohol gels!!
customer_reviews.text: I *love* Cleanwell products. It is such a relief to have an alternative to alcohol gels!! We use the foam pump dispenser at home, plus the cleaner spray and cleaning wipes around the house, and carry the purse-pack wipes and these pocket-sized spray bottles with us everywhere. We wouldn't be without them! The scent is mild, and you don't get that gel goo drying on your hands. This is a great product that just works. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Abracapocus

customer_reviews.title: Herb smell is unappealing
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever wanted to smell like your jar of oregano then this is the hand sanitizer for you. The smell is fine as one of many in a recipe, but as the only smell on my hands, it is totally unappealing. Deducting two stars as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Me123

customer_reviews.title: Superior alternative to alcohol based sprays
customer_reviews.text: Mild scent and does not dry skin like alcohol based sprays. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Monczka

customer_reviews.title: I only go one bottle
customer_reviews.text: It is listed as a 6 pack but I only got one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Hand-Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Spray and ingredients are clutch. It may not smell great, but what hand-sanitizer does?
customer_reviews.author: Team Eliasen

customer_reviews.title: Must have - esp with all the new bugs going around... work great even compared to non-natural, harsher chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: These are great all-natural products, they smell great (not perfumey or alcohol-like), and I've been re-ordering them since 2011. I keep one in my car, one in the kitchen, and one in each of the bathrooms. I've done some homework online and they rank consistently well when compared even to non-natural, harsher chemical products. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TomHunter1968

customer_reviews.title: Woo hoo! A safe hand sanitizer that is kiddo-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: At long last, a hand sanitizer that has NO alcohol and causes NO skin problems. You can absolutely feel good about using this hand sanitizer on kiddos. If you are eco-friendly, you can rest easy because cleanwell gives a thorough list of all ingredients and what they mean in terms of health and the environment. Perfectly sized, super convenient, smells natural/fresh, and works very well. Its pricier, but the peace of mind for children is absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: sassymom

customer_reviews.title: Natural Hand Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Been using it for at least 5 years. It has a pleasant herbal smell and doesn't dry your hands out as normal sanitizer would. Its small design allows for it to easily stow away and travel with in the smallest of purses. Also great for air travel as it meets TSA guidelines. I usually buy these in packs and one bottle will last months. Priced reasonably too.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: An essential find.
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this through my co-worker who uses their product and I'm glad. It's alcohol-free with natural ingredients, so it's not harsh on your hands yet it is very effective. I also love the smell of this product. Will definitely buy again when I run out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent description!!!  1 arrived not 6!!!
customer_reviews.text: there was only 1 travel size not 6 like it was described online. Really dishonest as I was going to give them to family, especially my 96 year old grandmother who needs it more than you.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie  Allen

customer_reviews.title: Only one bottle
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware....this is advertised as a six pack but I only got one bottle in my order.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lenahan

customer_reviews.title: Great hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this hand sanitizer for years and it's still my favorite. I work in healthcare so I need to wash my hands frequently or use this hand sanitizer. It has a very mild scent, contains no alcohol so it doesn't dry out your hands, and it the spray never clogs. It lasts a very long time and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hand sanitizer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition. I've used this product before and it's alcohol free and free of chemicals, so it's perfect for eczema prone skin like myself. It also gives you leave if mind that you won't expose your children to chemicals. You also receive a 24 pack instead of the 6 pack that is listed, so it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rose C

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to triclosan based products.
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff all the time since I am allergic to triclosan, the main ingredient in most sanitizers. I have had to cut a ring off due to the reaction from other sanitizers. This stuff is safe, easy to carry, small, and works well!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi_A

customer_reviews.title: this stuff stinks
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the scent. I want an unscented hand sanitizer, and this isn't it. Clean Well used to be a much better product before they switched to this foaming stinker. Still, I gave it a 3 overall because it is better than many other products. But I will not buy Clean Well again. From now on I will make my own hand sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: stephen kirbach

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This was handy to keep in a pocket while at a gaming convention. I loved the smell, but it did leave my hands feeling a bit sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Good product with scientific support
customer_reviews.text: FDA-registered; cost-effective and with olfactory appeal. Delivery system is simple, but effective. Good product with scientific support.
customer_reviews.author: Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I looovvvveeeed it. The smell isn’t great but it delivered 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Beshayer Alotaibi

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but convenient to carry in my purse. Leaves my hands with a sticky clammy feeling. :-/
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Healthy alternative
customer_reviews.text: These smell amazing and don’t strip everything off of my sensitive skin! Thanks for a healthier alternative to toxic hand sanitizers!
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have begun to look harder for healthy household product and those that leave the house too. Checked out Clean Well online and appreciate the company's approach and use of natural, non-toxic ingredients. Packed this on a two-day hike; it came in handy for me and others. Don't mind the thyme oil scent. Would recommend to others, as a matter of fact gifting a few.
customer_reviews.author: Maniac

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually like using hand sanitizer if I can just wash my ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually like using hand sanitizer if I can just wash my hands, but I got this to use on my toddler. I packed one in her lunch for preschool. It's a really good smell. Isn't sticky. I feel good about letting my kids use it.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Best hand sanitizer ever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. The size is perfect to carry in my purse or pocket, it smells great, and it does not dry out my skin. I use this at work when I am too busy to get to the sink between patients, after handling icky cart handles when grocery shopping, and with my daughter when we are out and about. She really likes it, too, and has one in her lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: K. Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I always love this product I will keep buying it
customer_reviews.author: john aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Hand Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet, it smells okay and has 0% alcohol
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Natural and does not dry out your hands. This size is great for purse or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Moho

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was already expired in Sept 2019.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: No alcohol, natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years. Unlike hand sanitizer, it does not contain alcohol and is not drying on the skin. I keep the pocket size in my pocketbook, and use the larger size at home and in the room where I offer organic facials. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling botanical hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Prefer orange/vanilla scent, but still love product. Have been using for years, and will continue to do so. Love the fact it’s alcohol free
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: easy to open
customer_reviews.text: it compact, easy to open. Most important keeps hands clean without stinging or drying up hands
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gentle hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hand sanitizing product. Unlike most which rely on varying percentages of alcohol this uses thyme extract. The product itself has a pleasant herbal fragrance. I have used many hand sanitizers and this is my favorite. Generally I purchase this at my local health food store and was pleased to find it here on Amazon in bulk for a bit of a discount. I also have bought the hand wipes from this company as well using the same great formula and I would definitely recommend both products.
customer_reviews.author: WNshopper

customer_reviews.title: Check expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: Check the expiration date on arrival. original order and replacement order were expiring within a month of of arrival. Ordered this item before and was happy with it. This time around, got products that wont last long enough. Amazon took care of the situation, but worried that if I order again, it'll just be expiring soon too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This product smelled horrible and we cent use it and it cant be returned. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Marx

customer_reviews.title: Only Received One!!
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to receive 6 and only received 1. Over $20 to purchase 1 hand sanitizer. If I had of gotten the 6 pack like it said, I would be totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: LLindsey

customer_reviews.title: Just say no
customer_reviews.text: While this product may be alcohol free and kid safe, it is boasted to be a "citrus herb scent" and it in reality smells like wet grass left in the lawnmower. Gross. Whatever happened to fragrance free? What a waste of money and it was promptly thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: JRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Broken package and missing products
customer_reviews.text: This package was opened and retapped when i got this. Also only got one but it supposed be 6bottles. Someone must steal this package and only left one bottle. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Seunghee baek

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy, it only lasts few months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Jan 2020 but the expiry date is May2020...
customer_reviews.author: wong sin mei

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is organic and has no alcohol for my hands. I also use it on my granddaughter who is two years old. No allergic reaction from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Phnx

customer_reviews.title: This does not dry out your hands and is not bad for you or the environment
customer_reviews.text: Wish schools had this instead of Purell. This does not dry out your hands and is not bad for you or the environment. I put one in my car, one in the kid's lunch boxes. It's great! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Natural Hand Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Natural Hand Sanitizer! This is an awesome natural hand santizer. It is in spray form, which is much better than gel, for me. It has a very clean smell, not overpowering. Thank you so much! Will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: I like this hand sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I like this hand sanitizer. No alcohol for sensitive skin. Has a light citrus smell. Sprays on. No worries about cap leaking or falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Super useful with a new baby- it's the only one ...
customer_reviews.text: An absolute staple in our home now. Super useful with a new baby- it's the only one we've found that is 'kid safe'!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed that i cannot use it
customer_reviews.text: description didn't say it's citrus only said thyme and i'm allergic to citrus. disappointed that i cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to do anything. So little sprays out that you have to continually spray to get enough to rub together. I don't feel refreshed after using it, so I'm not sure it is effective.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine G

customer_reviews.title: Works well and does not react with the skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is so good it is the only one my wife will use. She is a germaphobe, but she needs a sanitizer that is not only efficient, but is also gentle on her skin. This works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Only gives 1 not a 6 pack
customer_reviews.text: Literally got only one....not even the pack. Paid 15 for 1- 1oz handsanitizer. Scam don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product due to being allergic to so many things and the fact that I have eczema on my hands and fingers. This product has definitely helped my issues not re-occur since I just use this instead of soap when washing your hands. My son who is 2 uses it to and it is so natural it works perfect on his little hands. I would defintiely buy it again. It is also very compact to place right in your purse or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani

customer_reviews.title: This is a healthy and effective alternative to alcohol-based hand ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a healthy and effective alternative to alcohol-based hand sanitizers and is in a convenient pocket or purse-sized container that has a cap...just flip it open and spritz, rub your hands and you're done. No grease, no sticky feeling - just clean hands.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: great sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is natural, alcohol free and chemical free -I don't have to worry about using it on my baby when we are out. I do not like the herbal smell and the sticky feeling it eaves after you use it, but it us not a big deal and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better than alcohol sprays
customer_reviews.text: Dry hands no more! Kill germs the natural way while keeping hands from cracking! Thank you!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to hand sanitizers with alchohol
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for people with extremely dry hands. Won't dry them out like most hand sanitizers. Perfect size for the car, backpacks, purses, pockets, coats, and the office. I've seen some people comment on the scent but it's really not that bad at all. I also use the Clean Well Foaming Hand Sanitizer at home. This stuff is effective as it seems to really kill germs naturally!
customer_reviews.author: Smoothshaverator

customer_reviews.title: Safer and Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I initally found this product in Target, and my Target no longer carries them. With a new baby I use this constantly. I keep one in my car, one in my purse and one everywhere else! I put it on her, and do not have to worry about toxic chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Stottmann

customer_reviews.title: We love these sanitizers!
customer_reviews.text: We're huge thymol fans - sanitizes as well as alcohol, but safe for the kiddies to put their fingers in their mouths. This is a terrific price (they're up to $3.99 in stores EACH!) and we buy them every few months.
customer_reviews.author: J.Simms

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! All natural. Has thyme oil as antibacterial. Doesn't dry your hands. Best I've ever tried. Would not change to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Nana277

customer_reviews.title: Awesome natural sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: We are pretty adamant about only using green/natural/organic products for our family. This is an excellent alternative to chemical-based hand sanitizers. It doesn't dry out your hands like alcohol sanitizers and is safe for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Los Brushes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when I was working at a summer camp. Everyone there got the stomach bug but me. It's works well even without the alcohol content. It does not dry or irritate your hands. Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I got this Clean Well hand sanitizer in my goody bag at a 10K race and fell in love with it. I have one everywhere - car, bathroom, purse, and travel case. It doesn't irritate my skin and it smell pleasant, too
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn R. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Expire on NOV 2017
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 6 pack end of June 2017 only to find out they all expire on NOV 2017?! NOT EVEN 5 months left before they all expire..
customer_reviews.author: ProV1

customer_reviews.title: great, simple
customer_reviews.text: A nice simple natural cleanser. I keep it in my purse and so far it hasn't leaked. Have bought many of these. Between this and taking vitamin d daily, I rarely (almost never) get colds.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Naturally cleans and doesn't dry your hands out. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: have not gotten sick using it so I assume it works. Easy spray action, spreads well. Smells like salt water. I wish I trusted/knew all the ingredients. but great alternative to alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: OCD reviewer

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: easy to carry, safe for kids, no stinky chemical smell, love it!
customer_reviews.author: be a healthy puppy

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: works great! i use these to replace my soaps and when i'm on the go. doesn't leave your hands dry and instantly kills harmful bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Marc D

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, convenient, kids love it, portable, non-greasy, and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: i had an allergic reaction on my skin but it might work for others also it has a very weird natural herb smell which could be a another thing you have to consider if you use it 24/7
customer_reviews.author: nj1231

customer_reviews.title: All expired dates already
customer_reviews.text: All 6 of the sanitizers had expired dates of 4 months previous.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I'd listened to the other reviewers and found these in a store. All 6 of my bottles are expired. That is such a disappointment. I rely on hand sanitizers to keep my 2 year old daughter cold-free during this season, and she's already been sick twice in the past month. Now, I have to find a box and deal with shipping this back. This company is getting a bad score from me.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great products, and the foaming hand sanitizer is a nice addition as well
customer_reviews.text: Best and sanitizer and doesn't drag your hands. It is also full of really good non-harmful chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Tucson1

customer_reviews.title: Purse, Lunchbox & Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years--pleased with results & feel like it's a "safer option" for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really bad
customer_reviews.text: The order said it was 6 pieses I only received 1. Too much money and lies
customer_reviews.author: Dania Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got this sanitizer from my brother and loved it so I ordered more for the rest of the family. It has a fresh thyme scent and doesn't burn my skin like other sanitizers. I also like the flip top cap and gentle spray as opposed to the usual glob in the hand provided by other sanitizers. Lasts a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought a pack of 6 but only received 1!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack of 6 but only received 1!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: natural
customer_reviews.text: love the ease of use and that it is natural
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Natural is Best
customer_reviews.text: Being all-natural is what sold these guys to me. I purchased the 6-pack a few days ago and received it today. It has a nice smell and works fine without the alcohol and chemicals found in other hand sanitizers. If you haven't already, get some!
customer_reviews.author: Stacks

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love all clean well products! Give these travel sized hand sanitizers to all of my friends as baby shower gifts & keep one in each of my bags and cars.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Goldmann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a hand sanitizer that doesn't have alcohol in it. My hands are much happier!
customer_reviews.author: Bhuff

customer_reviews.title: Always carry this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kids bags and cars. The scent is great and it doesn't dry out the hands as Purell does.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.L.

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent and the fact that it sprays
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for a few years now. I love the scent and the fact that it sprays.
customer_reviews.author: Mikela

customer_reviews.title: it smells great and it works
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this stuff. It is safe for children, it smells great and it works! We use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, as usual! No triclosan or other bad medicine...
customer_reviews.author: DMacKinney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it won't make your hand dry and no smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean off a shopping cart, loved that it's a pump spray!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it doesn't use alcohol since my kid has eczema
customer_reviews.author: K. lam

product_meta.title: CleanWell Botanical Hand Sanitizer Spray, Citrus Thyme, 1 fl oz (6 PK) - Travel Size, Alcohol Free, Antibacterial, Kid Friendly, Plant-Based, Nontoxic, Cruelty Free, Moisturizing Formula
product_meta.description: Our hand sanitizer kills germs botanically, so you get the most satisfying clean. And don't bother reaching for the hand lotion, our formula moisturizes skin with aloe and oats.
feature_bullets: COMPARE WITH: Dr. Bronner's, EO, Everyone, Purell, Babyganics, Germ-X, and Wet Ones
